column4: My computer 3 does not repond to normal keypresses (eg Ctrl+Alt+F1). Using Touchpad I can move the mouse pointer. On computer 2 in my LAN I did '~$ ssh <username@3>' and '~$ sudo kill 1056'. But this did not kill X on 3. Is my only option to restart 3?
sudo service gdm restart will restart Xorg for you
It is Karmic. But it responds: "restart: Unknown instance: ."
